lyrics.text:
’E ulo ngingila
‘A hoku sino ni,
Hange ko e sino lelei
‘O hoku Huhu’i.

’Eiki ‘oku tupu
‘I ho’o pekia,
‘E ma’u ‘amanaki pehē
Te mau monū’ia.

Pea ke mau tui
‘O fa’a fakafeta’i
Ki he ‘Afiona ‘Eiki,
‘I he maama kovi.

Pea mau ikuna
‘I he’emau tui,
‘A e kovi kotoa pē
‘Oku ‘i lalo.

Pea ke mau hao
‘I he ‘Afiona,
Pea lava ki he lelei
‘Oku ’i ‘olunga.

Pea te mau hiva
‘I he hiva fo’ou,
‘I he’emau lava atu
Ki he maama lelei.
